name: CPR & AED Training "What will you do when person falls in front of you?" (Prototype)
name_original: CPR & AED Training "What will you do when person falls in front of you?" (Prototype)
description:
[Prototype] VR Training for CPR & AED. You can learn the flow in case someone fall in front of you.  *For Quest & Quest 2

This Project is in development stage! Please give me comments & feedback to make this more useful.

What will you do when person falls in front of you? 

You can experience whole decision making process in VR. 

Please comment if you support this project :D

[Attributions]

Music: https://www.bensound.com
